name: Explosive Harvest
description:
Controls: 

WSAD to move W or space to jump

Mouse to aim and shoot

E to blend Ammo together 

In the near future GMO plants have begun to grow explosive fruits and veggies, this has apparently angered the Fae realm who have noticed the invasive plants showing up in their realm as well.

Features:

  • Combine Ammo to make better ammo
  • at least 3 different enemy things on the screen(including bosses)
  • A news ticker cause it felt fun
  • Live acting cutscene
  • multiple levels(3 of them! that’s more than some AAA games… if you imagine the entire game is one level)
  • AI generated art!(its the future…. or at least it might be, the Ai isn’t very good)

Just look at these amazing graphics, if you were from the 1930s you would be amazed!
